subject: Doping (Sports)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: The house of Yaroslav Popovych, a RadioShack teammate of Lance Armstrong, was raided by the police in Tuscany, Italy, as part of a doping investigation there.
snippet: The house of Yaroslav Popovych, a RadioShack teammate of Lance Armstrong, was raided by the police in Tuscany, Italy, as part of a doping investigation there.
